TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit StringValidatorAttribute extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class StringValidatorAttribute Inherits ConfigurationValidatorAttribute

summary.span: 以声明的方式指示 .NET Framework 对配置属性执行字符串验证。

span.span: Declaratively instructs the .NET Framework to perform string validation on a configuration property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你使用修饰的配置属性。You use the to decorate a configuration property. 这是为了指示要验证属性使用的.NET Framework并将装饰参数的值传递给它。This is to instruct the .NET Framework to validate the property using the and pass to it the value of the decorating parameters. 你可以将应用只能对属性类型的对象。You can apply objects to property types only. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何修饰的自定义属性对象使用对象。The following example shows how to decorate the properties of a custom object using the object. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes/CS/ConfigurationValidatorAttributes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorAttributes/VB/ConfigurationValidatorAttributes.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 特性化模型中使用此构造函数，以确保分配给配置元素属性的值是字符串类型。You use this constructor in the attributed model to ensure that the value assigned to the configuration-element property is of a string type. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 构造函数。The following example shows how to use the constructor. span.span: Gets or sets the maximum length allowed for the string to assign to the property.
